inclusion.criterion: Adult individual 18 yr. of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cognitively intact and capable of giving informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of a non-penetrating traumatic SCI to the cervical spine
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior history of Recent or ongoing infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant cardiovascular, lung, renal, hepatic, or endocrine disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has hypertension and hypothyroidism but no acute intracranial findings on CT angiogram. He is being monitored in the ICU for 24 hours.
